page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS, TRANSPORT
page.content: S Molton or Fore St!). Perhaps the chief concern is the lack of facilit- ies for the young. Many comments made were simply cries for buildings such as a Sports Centre with its associated facilities. A concern of the village is the police...More visible (village) police...permanently manned police sta ...especially outside pubs at closing time...a veterinary. Finally, comments not noted above: Much does go on..good selection of social organisations... marvellous community...good quality of life. Amen!{TRANSPORT }The most popular way of communicating with Exeter or Barnstaple is the use of one's car, or Turner's bus used by car or non-car owners alike because of its economical fare. Weekly buses go on four days to Exeter, once to S Molton & once to Barnstaple. Railways come a poor third - station 3 km S of village
